name: The object of the car
instruction:
Write a function `carCreate` that takes four parameters:

* `brand` - a string, the name of the car brand
* `model` - a string, the name of the car model
* `year` - number, year of manufacture of the car
* `color` - line, color of the car

The function must return an object with the properties:
* `brand` - car brand name. Remove spaces at the beginning and at the end of the string.
* `model` - car model name. Delete the spaces at the beginning and at the end of the line.
* `year` - the year of manufacture of the car
* `color` - color of the car. Remove spaces at the beginning and at the end of the string, and lower case.
* `code` - a string consisting of the first letters of the make, model, year and color of the car. The letters must be in upper case.

Examples of function start:
```javascript
carCreate(' Toyota ', ' Camry ', 2010, ' BLACK '); // { brand: 'Toyota', model: 'Camry', year: 2010, color: 'black', code: 'TC2010B' }
carCreate(' Nissan ', ' Almera ', 2015, ' White '); // { brand: 'Nissan', model: 'Almera', year: 2015, color: 'white', code: 'NA2015W' }
```
